recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Brown the ground beef with chopped onion and garlic. 3. Add tomatoes and simmer. 4. Mix with spaghetti.
recipes.author: john_doe

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: A spicy and flavorful chicken curry.
recipes.instructions: 1. Fry onions, garlic, and ginger. 2. Add chicken and brown. 3. Add curry powder and coconut milk. 4. Simmer until chicken is cooked.
recipes.author: jane_doe
